original_text: Jesus has opened a new way for us to come near to God. That way gives us life with God. It leads us through the curtain into God's Most Holy Place. Jesus opened that curtain for us when he offered his own body to God as a sacrifice. The curtain in the tabernacle was like a door to the Most Holy Place. When Jesus died on the cross, the curtain tore into two pieces. See Matthew 27:51. That is a picture of what is really true in heaven. When Jesus died on our behalf, he opened the way to God. The blood of his sacrifice makes us clean because God has forgiven our sins if we believe in Jesus. So now, we do not need to be afraid when we come to God. We can come near to him and he will not punish us. We are like people who can go into the Most Holy Place in the tabernacle. 10: Jesus has opened a new way for us to come near to God. That way gives us life with God. It leads us through the curtain into God's Most Holy Place. Jesus opened that curtain for us when he offered his own body to God as a sacrifice. The curtain in the tabernacle was like a door to the Most Holy Place. When Jesus died on the cross, the curtain tore into two pieces. See Matthew 27:51. That is a picture of what is really true in heaven. When Jesus died on our behalf, he opened the way to God. The blood of his sacrifice makes us clean because God has forgiven our sins if we believe in Jesus. So now, we do not need to be afraid when we come to God. We can come near to him and he will not punish us. We are like people who can go into the Most Holy Place in the tabernacle. 10: Jesus has opened a new way for us to come near to God. That way gives us life with God. It leads us through the curtain into God's Most Holy Place. Jesus opened that curtain for us when he offered his own body to God as a sacrifice.
korean_text: 그 길은 우리를 위하여 휘장 가운데로 열어 놓으신 새로운 살 길이요 휘장은 곧 그의 육체니라

sentences.original_text: Jesus has opened a new way for us
sentences.korean_translation: 예수님께서 우리를 위해 새로운 길을 열어주셨습니다

sentences.original_text: to come near to God
That way gives us life with God
sentences.korean_translation: 그 길은 하나님과 함께하는 생명을 우리에게 줍니다

sentences.original_text: It leads us through the curtain
into God's Most Holy Place
Jesus opened that curtain for us
sentences.korean_translation: 예수님께서 우리를 위해 그 휘장을 열어주셨습니다

sentences.original_text: when he offered his own body to God
sentences.korean_translation: 자신의 몸을 하나님께 제물로 드렸을 때입니다

sentences.original_text: as a sacrifice
The curtain in the tabernacle
was like a door to the Most Holy Place
When Jesus died on the cross
the curtain tore into two pieces
See Matthew 27:51
That is a picture of what is really true
in heaven
When Jesus died on our behalf
he opened the way to God
The blood of his sacrifice makes us clean
sentences.korean_translation: 그분 희생의 피가 우리를 깨끗하게 합니다

sentences.original_text: because God has forgiven our sins
if we believe in Jesus
So now, we do not need to be afraid
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 이제 우리는 두려워할 필요가 없습니다

sentences.original_text: when we come to God
We can come near to him
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 그분께 가까이 나아갈 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: and he will not punish us
We are like people who can go into
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 들어갈 수 있는 사람들과 같습니다

sentences.original_text: the Most Holy Place in the tabernacle
sentences.korean_translation: 성막의 지성소로 들어갈 수 있는 사람들과 같습니다
